definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: insult, reproach, ignominy;—abs. ´[[כ]] Is 45:16 + 9 t.; cstr. [[כְּלִמַּת]] Je 20:11 + 3 t.; sf. [[כְּלִמָּתִי]] Job 20:3 + 3 t., etc., pl. [[כְּלִמּוֹת]] Mic 2:6, Is 50:6; —
specif., insult, reproach, ´[[לאׁ יִסַּג כ]] Mic 2:6 reproaches do not cease; [[מוּסַר כְּלִמָּתִי]] Job 20:3 = my beshaming (insulting) correction, i.e. the correction which insults me.

in gen., reproach, ignominy, opp. [[כָּבוֹד]] Ps 4:3; ´[[הלך בַּכּ]] Is 45:16 go into ignominy (+ [[בּוֹשׁ]], [[נִכְלַם]]); oft. ‖[[בּשֶׁת]] Is 30:3, Is 61:7, Ps 44:16, subj. of [[כִּסָּה]] Je 3:25 our ignomity covereth us, so under fig. of garment, after [[לָבַשׁ]] Ps 35:26 (+ [[בושׁ]], [[חפר]] in v:a), Ps 109:29; ‖[[חֶרְפָּה]] Ps 69:8 (subj. of [[כִּסְּתָה פָּנׇ֑י]]), Je 51:51 (id.; [[בושׁ]] in ‖ cl.), Ps 71:13 (+ [[בושׁ]] in ‖ cl.); ‖[[בּשֶׁת]] + [[חֶרְפָּה]] Ps 69:20; ‖[[אִוֶּלֶת]] Pr 18:13; ‖[[רׂק]] Is 50:6; [[עוֹלָם]] ´[[כ]] Je 20:11 ([[בושׁ]] in ‖ cl.); [[כְּלִמָּתֵח]] Ez Eze 16:63 (id. ‖); oft. in Ezek. ´[[נשׂא כ]] bear ignominy, Ez Eze 16:52, Eze 16:52 (‖[[בושׁ]]), v:Eze 16:54 ([[נִכְלַם]] in cl.); Eze 32:24, Eze 32:25, Eze 32:30 (all + [[אֶת־יוֹרְדֵי בוֹר]] with those who go down to the pit; ref. to ignominious death), Eze 36:7, Eze 39:26 (si vera 1. = bear the humiliating sense of underserved kindness from ´[[י]]; but txt. dub., Hi Co, q.v., [´[[כ]]] [[נשׁו]]; Sm Da defend); [[נאשׂ כְּלִמַּת]] [[הַגּוֹיִם]], i.e. caused by the nations, 34:39, Eze 36:6, also v:Eze 36:15 (‖[[חֶרְפַּת עַמִּים]]), prob. also Ps 89:51 (rd. [[כְּלִמַּת]], cf. VB Che Bae); [[כְּלִמָּתָם יְתוֹעֲבוֹתָם אֲשֶׁר עָשׂוּ]] ´[[וְנ]] Ez Eze 44:13.
